amendment.description: Amendment sought to require Federal agencies to consult with concerned citizens before proposing Federal regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to include concerned citizens as those who could be designated to provide meaningful and timely input in the development of regulatory proposals containing significant Federal intergovernmental mandates. Currently, the bill specifies state, local and tribal governments for the purposes of providing input.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A036) Failed by voice vote.
